governance.chain: L0 Human → L1 LDS Kernel V1 → L2 Proposer

core.name: PROJECT SAINT
core.description: Complete building envelope contractor platform built on LDS streaming architecture. White-label ready. Kernel-governed. Intelligence lives in data, not models.

principles: Stateless UI shell — buttons, forms, display only
On-demand loading — only current screen entities in memory
L1 Kernel validation — CHECK-THEN-ACT on every action
Deterministic boundaries — same input = same output
White-label ready — branding via config entity swap
architecture.data_flow: User Action → L1 Kernel Check → If ALLOWED → Load Entity → Render → Execute

trust_hierarchy.L0: Human Governance (Armand Lefebvre) — sets policy, approves scope
trust_hierarchy.L1: SAINT Kernel — validates invariants, enforces policy
trust_hierarchy.L2: Proposers (AI agents, users) — requests execution within bounds

build_sequence.name: FOUNDATION
build_sequence.description: Core kernel, role boundaries, app shell, authentication

build_sequence.name: GCP_TOOLS
build_sequence.description: Shop drawing automation, opportunity finder, GCP product configurator

build_sequence.name: CONTRACTOR_PORTAL
build_sequence.description: Contractor dashboard, warranty tracking, submittal management

build_sequence.name: SALES_CRM
build_sequence.description: Sales pipeline, territory management, analytics & reporting

build_sequence.name: ENTERPRISE
build_sequence.description: White-label branding engine, enterprise SSO, external API layer

build_sequence.name: OPERATIONS
build_sequence.description: Admin console, subscription management, third-party integrations

tiers.name: Contractor
tiers.includes: Dashboard, submittals, warranty tracking, product lookup

tiers.name: GCP Engineer
tiers.includes: All contractor tools + shop drawings + product config

tiers.name: Enterprise
tiers.includes: Full platform + white label + SSO + API + dedicated support

pricing_model.note: Expedited/emergency work billed at 150-200% of standard rate
